channel.title: How to add ::PURE ON Project Insanity
channel.description:
Hi.
I need some Spoon Feedin'. Hope do I add ::Pure for everyone so everyone can use?
Matt

item.title: How to add ::PURE ON Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“Sohail, post:3, topic:373073”]Uhm i dont do spoonfeeding normaly but since i’m in a good mood

You can edit this master command to your pure command.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}[/quote]
Wrong and also next time put the code tags.

The command should look like this:

if(command.startsWith("pure") && playerRights > 0){ addSkillXP(302288, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(302288, 2); addSkillXP(302288, 3); addSkillXP(302288, 4); addSkillXP(302288, 6); currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendQuest("" + currentHealth + "", 4016); playerRights = 0; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to add ::PURE ON Project Insanity

item.title: How to add ::PURE ON Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

Uhm i dont do spoonfeeding normaly but since i’m in a good mood

You can edit this master command to your pure command.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
}
c.getPA().requestUpdates();
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to add ::PURE ON Project Insanity
